history.content: Carol Christ said in previous emails that she’d release a decision week of the 15th of June (next week) so I feel like that’s the best the department itself can do. There’s going to be a confirmed web component so if you want to move that’s fine but class expansion also depends on TA hiring and staffing decisions.
Carol Christ said in previous emails that she’d release a decision week of the 15th of June (next week).

Hello, EECS faculty. I hope your summer is going well. Is there an estimated date we should expect an announcement on how EECS plans to provide instruction for the fall semester? I have yet to cancel my lease contract, but knowing as soon as possible would help me and countless other students. It's also difficult to speculate, given that the 61-series enrolls up to 2,000 students, but in-person resources have helped students more. Thank you. (I also am aware that the university will announce its plans on the week of June 15th, but I seek confirmation from this department.)
history.subject: Department decision on fall 2020 class format
